    queue := flag.String("q", "", "The name of the queue")
    waitTime := flag.Int64("w", 10, "How long the queue waits for messages")
    flag.Parse()

    if *queue == "" {
        fmt.Println("You must supply a queue name (-q QUEUE")
        return
    }

    if *waitTime < 0 {
        *waitTime = 0
    }

    if *waitTime > 20 {
        *waitTime = 20
    }
